channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech

item.title: Spotify revamps its Discover Weekly playlist after ten years
item.description: Spotify is making Discover Weekly more customizable by genre.

item.title: 13 Best French Presses (2025): Plastic, Glass, Stainless Steel, Travel
item.description: The humble French press is affordable, effective, and hard to mess up. Here are our favorites to make your morning cup of coffee.

item.title: Why AI will eat McKinsey’s lunch — but not today

item.title: Trump says he’s found a buyer for TikTok
item.description: A group of “very wealthy people” is set to buy short-form video app TikTok, according to President Donald Trump.

item.title: OpenAI reportedly ‘recalibrating’ compensation in response to Meta hires

item.title: Plantaform Smart Indoor Garden Review: Rewarding but Risky
item.description: We tested this unique indoor gardening solution that utilizes NASA technology, but air quality data raised concerns.

item.title: 23 Best Power Banks (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Keep your phone, laptop, handheld gaming console, and other electronics running with these travel-friendly power banks.

item.title: OpenAI Leadership Responds to Meta Offers: ‘Someone Has Broken Into Our Home’
item.description: As Mark Zuckerberg lures away top research talent to Meta, OpenAI executives say they're “recalibrating comp,” according to an internal memo.

item.title: With ‘F1’, Apple finally has a theatrical hit
item.description: Looks like Apple has its first bona fide box office hit.

item.title: 13 Best MagSafe Power Banks for iPhones (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Keep your iPhone topped up with one of these WIRED-tested MagSafe portable chargers.
